seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience with 4-5 years relevant, implementing predictive models and designing applications suggests mid-level seniority

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities involve data pipelines, ETL, and data processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on ETL tools, data integration, and batch processing capabilities with Azure Databricks and PySpark

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports - pure individual contributor role

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple Azure services explicitly mentioned: Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, Azure Blob storage

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only Azure services mentioned, no other cloud providers referenced

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both 'batch and real-time processing' explicitly in job description

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, Step Functions, etc.)

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Specifically requires Kochi, Kerala, India location with onsite work model

timezone_focus.evidence: India location specified, suggesting IST timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Must already be in Kochi, Kerala, India - no relocation mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is India-based, suggesting no H1B sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and role requires 6-7 years experience

citizenship_required.evidence: India-based role would require work authorization in India, no specific citizenship requirements mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM suggests W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentions in job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths to senior roles, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Long list of mandatory technical skills with specific years experience requirement suggests strict requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific technical requirements and clear responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills and 6-7 years experience align well for mid-level data engineer role, no unrealistic expectations
